txt.en:
'You have grown both in body and in spirit, [placeholder], and are now a guardian of great prowess. The Free Peoples are lucky to have one so courageous working tirelessly in their defence.

'The number of guardians that have achieved your level of skill are few, [placeholder]. The dwarf Wáli is one, and by his stout heart are the plans of many foes thwarted. Wáli may have words for a guardian such as you, if you seek him out at his station.

'Wáli maintains his vigilance at the outpost of Noglond, south of Thorin's Hall and west of the dwarf-city of Gondamon in Ered Luin. Speak to him if you wish to know the counsel of a courageous guardian.'

'You have grown both in body and in spirit, [placeholder], and are now a guardian of great prowess. The Free Peoples are lucky to have one so courageous working tirelessly in their defence.

'Wáli maintains his vigilance at the outpost of Noglond, south of Thorin's Hall and west of the dwarf-city of Gondamon in Ered Luin. Speak to him if you wish to know the counsel of a courageous guardian.'
Guardian: The Bravest Deed is Selfless

As a Guardian, you have achieved such renown as to receive a summons from Wáli of Gondamon in Ered Luin.\n\nYou should seek Wáli to receive further training in your class.

Meet Wáli for further Guardian training
'You are known to me, [placeholder], as a guardian of great skill and mighty deeds, and I can see that the tales I have heard do not miss the mark! Hail, and well-met at Noglond!'
You are a guardian almost without equal, and the Free Peoples of Middle-earth are shielded by your arm and your will.

'You have grown both in body and in spirit, [placeholder], and are now a guardian of great prowess. The Free Peoples are lucky to have one so courageous working tirelessly in their defence.

'The number of guardians that have achieved your level of skill are few, [placeholder]. The dwarf Wáli is one, and by his stout heart are the plans of many foes thwarted. Wáli may have words for a guardian such as you, if you seek him out at his station.

'Wáli maintains his vigilance at the outpost of Noglond, south of Thorin's Hall and west of the dwarf-city of Gondamon in Ered Luin. Speak to him if you wish to know the counsel of a courageous guardian.'
